casebody.data:
Smith, Appellant, v. Pelott, Respondent. (Supreme Court, General Term, Third Department. September 25, 1891.) Action by James M. Smith against Frank Pelott.

Argued before Learned, P. J., and Landon and Mayham, JJ. .

No opinion. Jurlgment affirmed, with costs. Appeal from order of referee dismissed, with $10 costs.
